record.dc:title: 137GP22, 15GP22, Greenup County, Kentucky. Hardin Village. Features and Postholes; Panorama with Photo 136.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Photograph of features and post holes forming overlapping panorama with Photograph 136GP22. In row from left foreground to center background are Features 54, 51, 57, 59; on extreme right, part of Features 53 and 61; in left center background are pit, Feature 62, and the end of 67, central fire basin. Shows also post holes thru #587. Profile in rear extends almost to stake 10R14.
record.wpa:comments: More information on Features and Field Specimens, including diagrams, available from institution.
